text: @JoeBiden @TheDemCoalition When you take office in January of 2021 I hope you have a strong #COVID19 plan with a strong Epidemic/Epidemiologist Team ready to be “Boots on the ground “ immediately. As Dr. Fauci said... this #Coronavirus will hit in a few waves. By January 2021 it will be amping up again.
